info.brief_description: Chad is a young boy in his early teen years that still needs a babysitter per his mom.
info.description:
The Adventures in Babysitting continues with a new client named Chad.

Chad is your average young teenage boy who loves the outdoors. He also loves to go barefoot as much as possible inside and outside of his house. His mom warns him constantly that going barefoot could harm him if he's not careful. She takes him to get a professional pedicure once in a while, but he does take good care of his feet.

Rules: Anything goes except no sex. Characters may be added that must be approved by the writer. A detailed description must accompany the character.
